name: Warrior Of Cookies
description:
Once upon a time inside a dungeon, live a warrior that love cookies and named himself the warrior of cookies, and he wants to make a lot of cookies package so he can share it to everyone, help him collect the cookies that shattered across the dungeon and create the package while also protecting his house from cookie-hater slime that wants to destroy his house because it also made out of cookie!

How to Play:
> Use arrow or aswd to Move
> Left mouse click to Attack
> Right mouse Click or capslock bar to open the minimap
> Check the minimap to see whether there is a slime or not
> Pick-up light potion to have a vision on the map and minimap
> The heart will be reduced by 1 if slime manage to get to the house or when the time to make the cookies package is up
